allow: Bash(/dev/null -e "SELECT sender_name, SUBSTRING\(content, 1, 80\) as content FROM chat_messages WHERE content LIKE ''%@\\_user\\_%'' ESCAPE ''\\\\'' LIMIT 20;")
Bash(/dev/null -N -e "SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM chat_messages WHERE content REGEXP ''@_user_[0-9]+'';")
Bash(/dev/null -e "SELECT COUNT\(*\) as cnt FROM chat_messages;")

Bash(/dev/null -e "SELECT id, chat_id, SUBSTRING\(chat_name, 1, 30\) as chat_name, status, synced_count, DATE_FORMAT\(created_at, ''%H:%i:%s''\) as created, DATE_FORMAT\(updated_at, ''%H:%i:%s''\) as updated FROM sync_tasks WHERE id >= 16 ORDER BY id;")
Bash(# 停止旧进程 pkill -f ""./team-assistant"" || true sleep 2 # 启动新的 API 进程 nohup ./team-assistant 2>&1 & echo $! sleep 2 cat .service.pid ps aux)
